title: 谁给个1.3.2神奇宝贝mod的懒人包
author: yuxinqi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuxinqi 于 2012-9-7 00:23 编辑 

或者教我怎么装这个mod...
明天放学来看帖子
我装了MC 1.3.2 - Player API client 1.1.zip   Spawner GUI.zip  AudioMod.zip        ModLoader.zip        和minecraftforge-universal-4.0.0.241.zip        然后把神奇宝贝mo的压缩包扔进
jar里开出来显示
 Minecraft has crashed!      
       ----------------------      

 Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
 This error has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-09-07_00.23.48-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
yuxinqi 发表于 2012-9-7 18:34 
对啊  modloader 和foege都装了 然后把压缩包扔进目录文件夹 解压缩  开出来崩.溃.
.其余forge要最早装、Modloader该不该装这种事我是不屑说的。
其余forge要最早装、Modloader该不该装这种事我是不屑说的。

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
很多人都像楼主一样，自己不好好研读安装说明，做事不认真，乱安装才出这样的问题，才导致问答区有这么一堆本可以避免的无意义问题。

Pixelmon1.6.2.zip你要解压到.minecraft文件夹里面

replies.author: yuxinqi
replies.txt_content: 还是崩**，，，他有没有和API什么的冲突了？
